pli-tv-pvr3:2.1: When the Buddha moon has not appeared,

pli-tv-pvr3:3.4: Endowed with vision, in this world with its supreme beings.
pli-tv-pvr3:4.1: They instruct in the True Teaching
pli-tv-pvr3:4.2: That ends suffering and brings happiness.
pli-tv-pvr3:4.4: He with compassion to all beings,
pli-tv-pvr3:5.1: The best of all creatures, the lion,
pli-tv-pvr3:5.4: And the Monastic Law, of great quality.

pli-tv-pvr3:6.2: So long as the Monastic Law remains,

pli-tv-pvr3:7.2: By the quality of the string of the Compendium.

pli-tv-pvr3:28.3: Asking, invites to take more than,
pli-tv-pvr3:30.1: Fewer than five mends, rainy season,

pli-tv-pvr3:44.1: On the thigh, and on a seat—

pli-tv-pvr3:44.6: The same as with the robe-making ceremony.
